welcome: Welcome to the GWA  Social Club
description: A private club for those who appreciate good smoke and good company.
about_description: We’re a chill community that loves good smoke, great music, and quality conversation. No pressure, just pleasure.
headline: Request Access – No Smoke and Mirrors, Just Good Vibes
subheadline: Our club is exclusive, not elitist—just a relaxed space for those who enjoy good company (and good smoke). Think you fit in? Send us a request!
form_intro: Alright champ—tell us a bit about yourself. Don’t worry, we don’t judge… much.
name: Name (as you like to be called)
why_join: Impress us. Or just say ‘I like good people and good vibes’—that works too.
favorite_smoke: Your favorite smoke (optional, but we judge)
